_header: With word and writ I warn thee Sir Eode [Vid word & wrid ic warne þe sire ode]
_description: A warning to Sir Eode — twelve lines with intervening Latin lines of similar content

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Vid word & wrid ic Warne þe sire odeDele al þi goid
                    pouere þad hawit neode…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…god þe hat þat is us bouenþe bere maist
                    þu y glide
CamTCC323.Note:
Preceding four lines of Latin verse begin, ‘Otide te munio verbo
                    scripto tibi monstro’ (f. 19).
